front.title: A framework for Management and Control of microwave and millimeter wave interface parameters

abstract.t: The unification of control and management of microwave radio link interfaces is a precondition for seamless multilayer networking and automated network provisioning and operation. This document describes the required characteristics and use cases for control and management of radio link interface parameters using a YANG Data Model. The purpose is to create a framework for identification of the necessary information elements and definition of a YANG Data Model for control and management of the radio link interfaces in a microwave node. Some parts of the resulting model may be generic which could also be used by other technologies, e.g., Ethernet technology.
